00053 void _null_terminate(char *s, int len) {
00054     int j;
00055     for (j=len-1; j>=0; j--) {
00056         if (!isspace(s[j])) {
00057             if (j < len-1) {
00058                 s[j+1] = 0;
00059             }
00060             break;
00061         }
00062     }
00063     if (j < 0) {
00064         s[0] = 0;
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 #ifdef WIN32
00069     const char fs = 92;
00070 #else
00071     const char fs = '/';
00072 #endif

00110 EGS_SimpleApplication::EGS_SimpleApplication(int argc, char **argv) {
00111 
00112     g = 0;
00113     source = 0;
00114     rndm = 0;
00115     input = 0;
00116 
00117     //
00118     // *** make sure that there is only a single application.
00119     //
00120     if (egsApp) egsFatal("There can only be a single EGS_SimpleApplication"
00121                              " in a program\n");
00122     egsApp = this;
00123     ncase = 0;
00124 
00125     //
00126     // *** set the number of histories to run
00127     //
00128     for (int i=0; i<argc-1; i++) {
00129         if (!strcmp("-n",argv[i]) || !strcmp("--ncase",argv[i])) {
00130             ncase = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00131             break;
00132         }
00133     }
00134     if (ncase < 1) {
00135         ncase = 1000;
00136     }
00137 
00138     //
00139     // *** init the EGS system
00140     //
00141     egsInit(argc,argv);
00142 
00143     //
00144     // *** null terminate directory and file names just in case
00145     //
00146     _null_terminate(the_egsio->user_code,64);
00147     _null_terminate(the_egsio->input_file,256);
00148     _null_terminate(the_egsio->output_file,256);
00149     _null_terminate(the_egsio->egs_home,128);
00150     _null_terminate(the_egsio->hen_house,128);
00151     _null_terminate(the_egsio->pegs_file,256);
00152     _null_terminate(the_egsio->work_dir,128);
00153 
00154     //
00155     // ********** Get the content of the input file.
00156     //
00157     string ifile(the_egsio->egs_home);
00158     ifile += the_egsio->user_code;
00159     ifile += fs;
00160     ifile += the_egsio->input_file;
00161     ifile += ".egsinp";
00162     input = new EGS_Input;
00163     input->setContentFromFile(ifile.c_str());
00164 
00165     //
00166     // ********** Construct a simulation geometry from the input
00167     //
00168     EGS_Input *geom_input = input->takeInputItem("geometry definition");
00169     if (!geom_input) {
00170         egsFatal("No geometry definition in the input file\n");
00171     }
00172     g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createGeometry(geom_input);
00173     if (!g) {
00174         egsFatal("Failed to construct the simulation geometry\n");
00175     }
00176     delete geom_input;
00177     EGS_BaseGeometry::describeGeometries();
00178     egsInformation("\nThe simulation geometry is of type %s and has the "
00179                    "name '%s'\n\n",g->getType().c_str(),g->getName().c_str());
00180 
00181     //
00182     // *********** Add the media names present in the geometry
00183     //
00184     for (int j=0; j<g->nMedia(); j++) {
00185         const char *medname = g->getMediumName(j);
00186         int len = strlen(medname);
00187         int ind = egsAddMedium(medname, len);
00188         if (ind != j+1) {
00189             egsFatal("Medium index mismatch: %d %d\n",ind,j+1);
00190         }
00191     }
00192 
00193     //
00194     // ********** Construct a particle source from the input
00195     //
00196     EGS_Input *source_input = input->takeInputItem("source definition");
00197     if (!source_input) {
00198         egsFatal("No source definition in the input file\n");
00199     }
00200     source = EGS_BaseSource::createSource(source_input);
00201     if (!source) {
00202         egsFatal("Failed to construct the particle source\n");
00203     }
00204     delete source_input;
00205 
00206     //
00207     // ********* Construct a random number generator from the input
00208     //
00209     rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(input,the_egsio->i_parallel);
00210     if (!rndm) {
00211         rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG(the_egsio->i_parallel);
00212     }
00213 
00214     //
00215     // ********** Get transport parameter settings from the input file
00216     //
00217     int ounit = 6;
00218     egsGetTransportParameter(&ounit);
00219 
00220     //
00221     // *********** Get the cross section data
00222     //
00223     egsHatch();
00224 
00225     //
00226     // *********** Set ecut_new and pcut_new
00227     //
00228     the_bounds->ecut_new = the_bounds->ecut;
00229     the_bounds->pcut_new = the_bounds->pcut;
00230 
00231     //
00232     // ********** Now check if the cross section data covers the energy
00233     //            range needed by the source
00234     //
00235     EGS_Float Emax = source->getEmax();
00236     bool is_ok = true;
00237     for (int imed=0; imed<g->nMedia(); imed++) {
00238         if (Emax > the_thresh->up[imed] ||
00239                 Emax > the_thresh->ue[imed] - the_useful->rm) {
00240             egsWarning("The maximum energy of the source (%g) is higher than\n"
00241                        "  the cross section data energy range for medium %d\n",
00242                        Emax,imed+1);
00243             is_ok = false;
00244         }
00245     }
00246     if (!is_ok) {
00247         egsFatal("Create new PEGS data sets and retry\n");
00248     }
00249 
00250     nreport = 10;
00251 
00252 }
00253 
00254 EGS_SimpleApplication::~EGS_SimpleApplication() {
00255     if (g) {
00256         if (g->deref()) {
00257             delete g;
00258         }
00259     }
00260     if (source) {
00261         delete source;
00262     }
00263     if (rndm) {
00264         delete rndm;
00265     }
00266     if (input) {
00267         delete input;
00268     }
00269 }
00270 
00271 void EGS_SimpleApplication::finish() {
00272     egsFinish();
00273 }
00274 
00275 int EGS_SimpleApplication::run() {
00276 
00277     egsInformation("\n\nSimulating %d particles...\n\n",ncase);
00278     EGS_Timer timer;
00279     timer.start();
00280     EGS_I64 nperb = ncase/nreport;
00281     if (nperb < 1) {
00282         nperb = 1;
00283     }
00284     EGS_Float aperb = ((EGS_Float)nperb)/((EGS_Float)ncase);
00285     int q, latch;
00286     EGS_Float E, wt;
00287     EGS_Vector x,u;
00288     sum_E = 0;
00289     sum_E2 = 0;
00290     Etot = 0;
00291     sum_w = 0;
00292     sum_w2 = 0;
00293     for (EGS_I64 icase=1; icase<=ncase; icase++) {
00294         if (icase%nperb == 0) egsInformation("+Finished %7.2f percent of"
00295                                                  " cases, cpu time = %9.3f\n",
00296                                                  100*aperb*(icase/nperb),timer.time());
00297         EGS_I64 this_case = source->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00298         //egsInformation("Got %d %g %g (%g,%g,%g) (%g,%g,%g) %lld\n",
00299         //      q,E,wt,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,this_case);
00300         sum_E += E*wt;
00301         sum_E2 += wt*E*E;
00302         sum_w += wt;
00303         sum_w2 += wt*wt;
00304         int ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00305         if (ireg < 0) {
00306             EGS_Float t = 1e30;
00307             ireg = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t);
00308             if (ireg >= 0) {
00309                 x += u*t;
00310             }
00311         }
00312         if (ireg >= 0) {
00313             //egsInformation(" entering in region %d\n",ireg);
00314             last_case = this_case;
00315             if (q == 1) {
00316                 Etot += (E + 2*the_useful->rm)*wt;
00317             }
00318             else {
00319                 Etot += E*wt;
00320             }
00321             the_stack->E[0] = (q) ? E + the_useful->rm : E;
00322             the_stack->x[0] = x.x;
00323             the_stack->y[0] = x.y;
00324             the_stack->z[0] = x.z;
00325             the_stack->u[0] = u.x;
00326             the_stack->v[0] = u.y;
00327             the_stack->w[0] = u.z;
00328             the_stack->dnear[0] = 0;
00329             the_stack->wt[0] = wt;
00330             the_stack->ir[0] = ireg+2;
00331             the_stack->iq[0] = q;
00332             the_stack->latch[0] = latch;
00333             the_stack->np = 1;
00334             startHistory(this_case);
00335             egsShower();
00336             endHistory();
00337         }
00338     }
00339     egsInformation("\n\nFinished simulation, CPU time was %g\n\n",
00340                    timer.time());
00341     sum_E = sum_E/sum_w;
00342     sum_E2 = sum_E2/sum_w;
00343     sum_E2 -= sum_E*sum_E;
00344     if (sum_E2 > 0) {
00345         sum_E2 = sqrt(sum_E2/(sum_w*sum_w/sum_w2-1));
00346     }
00347     egsInformation("Average particle energy: %g +/- %g\n\n",sum_E,sum_E2);
00348 
00349     return 0;
00350 
00351 }
00352 
00353 void EGS_SimpleApplication::fillRandomArray(int n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00354     rndm->fillArray(n,rarray);
00355 }

00357 extern __extc__ void egsHowfar() {
00358     int np = the_stack->np-1;
00359     int ireg = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00360     if (ireg < 0) {
00361         the_epcont->idisc = 1;
00362         return;
00363     }
00364     int newmed;
00365     int inew = egsApp->howfar(ireg,
00366                               EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],the_stack->z[np]),
00367                               EGS_Vector(the_stack->u[np],the_stack->v[np],the_stack->w[np]),
00368                               the_epcont->ustep,&newmed);
00369     if (inew != ireg) {
00370         the_epcont->irnew = inew+2;
00371         the_useful->medium_new = newmed+1;
00372         if (inew < 0) {
00373             the_epcont->idisc = -1; // i.e. discard after the step.
00374             the_useful->medium_new = 0;
00375         }
00376     }
00377 }
00378 
00379 extern __extc__ void egsAusgab(EGS_I32 *iarg) {
00380     egsApp->ausgab(*iarg);
00381 }
00382 
00383 extern __extc__ void egsHownear(EGS_Float *tperp) {
00384     int np = the_stack->np-1;
00385     int ireg = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00386     *tperp = egsApp->hownear(ireg,EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],
00387                              the_stack->z[np]));
00388 }
00389 
00390 extern __extc__ void egsStartParticle() {
00391     int np = the_stack->np - 1;
00392     int ir = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00393     the_useful->medium = egsApp->getMedium(ir)+1;
00394     the_epcont->idisc = 0;
00395 }
00396 
00397 extern __extc__ void egsFillRandomArray(const EGS_I32 *n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00398     egsApp->fillRandomArray(*n,rarray);
00399 }
